Dropdown.name: children
Dropdown.description: The contents of the MenuTrigger - a trigger and a Menu.

Dropdown.name: closeOnSelect
Dropdown.description: Whether the dropdown closes when a selection is made.

Dropdown.name: defaultOpen
Dropdown.description: Whether the overlay is open by default (uncontrolled).

Dropdown.name: isOpen
Dropdown.description: Whether the overlay is open by default (controlled).

Dropdown.name: offset
Dropdown.description:
The additional offset applied along the main axis between the element and its
anchor element.

Dropdown.name: onOpenChange
Dropdown.description: Handler that is called when the overlay's open state changes.

Dropdown.name: placement
Dropdown.description: The placement of the element with respect to its anchor element.

Dropdown.name: shouldFlip
Dropdown.description:
Whether the element should flip its orientation (e.g. top to bottom or left to right) when
there is insufficient room for it to render completely.

Dropdown.name: type
Dropdown.description: The type of menu that the menu trigger opens.

DropdownItem.name: endIcon
DropdownItem.description: Icon added after the button text.

DropdownItem.name: startIcon
DropdownItem.description: Icon added before the button text.
